name: GetTaxExemptionReasons
description:
Gets the available reasons for tax exemption.
The `Code` property of each result can then be supplied to `ExemptOrderFromTax` as the `TaxExemptionCode`.

properties.name: OrderID
properties.description:
If you have an OrderID available it can be specified to get a more accurate list of tax exemption reasons that is independent of your current OrganizationUnit.
For example if you have a US order but you are currently logged into a non-US organization, the result of this service won't be accurate unless you specify the OrderID.
